activities: This Safe Harbor certification applies only to personal information stored in LP Software, Inc’s On-Demand Hosted software products in the United States or in the United Kingdom. LP Software, Inc acts as a data processor for personal information stored in our On-Demand Hosted software products and acts pursuant to the client’s instructions with respect to such information. The applicable client is the data controller for such data. We may access or obtain personal information on behalf of a client for the purpose of providing technical support, maintenance and consulting services in connection with On-Demand Hosted software products or as otherwise directed by such client.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client, and third party data which may include manually processed data.
